metadata.title: CVE-2021-47135 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mt76:mt7921: fix possible AOOB issue in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report Fix possiblearray out of bound access in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report. Remove unnecessaryvaribable in mt7921_mcu_tx_rate_report

criterions.comment: linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
